tests.name: test_borrowing_a_book_after_copies_have_been_added_returns_the_book
tests.cmd:
isbn = "9780544003415"
library = Library.new
library.add_copies(isbn, count: 1)
library.borrow(isbn)

tests.name: test_borrowing_a_book_when_all_copies_have_been_borrowed_returns_nil
tests.cmd:
isbn = "9780544003415"
library = Library.new
library.add_copies(isbn, count: 1)
library.borrow(isbn)
library.borrow(isbn)

tests.name: test_returning_a_book_when_some_have_been_borrowed_returns_the_book
tests.cmd:
isbn = "9780544003415"
library = Library.new
library.add_copies(isbn, count: 1)
@library.borrow(isbn)
library.return(isbn)

tests.name: test_borrowed_returns_total_count_borrowed_books
tests.cmd:
isbns = ["9780191604928", "9780718198916", "9780974514055"]
library = Library.new
isbns.each { |isbn| library.add_copies(isbn, count: 1) ; library.borrow(isbn) }
library.borrowed
